verbs.description: As [ARG1: children and their parents] [V: wait] [ARG2: to be released from cages at the nation ’s borders] , President Trump released a statement about the annual Juneteenth celebration which marks the end of slavery America . For those who do n’t know about Juneteenth . # Juneteenth # Juneteenth2018 pic.twitter.com/PSOsvTLaJl — Frederick Joseph ( @FredTJoseph ) June 19 , 2018 How ironic . —Meek Mill participates …
